extension.summary: SLik skin by Jezz_X designed to be minimal and follow a theme
extension.description: SLik is designed to be minimal and follow a theme.[CR][CR]You won't find 100's of media views here just simple down to earth views that concentrate on accessing your media quick and easy and not just showing you all the metadata and not much media
SLik设计理念是小巧协调。[CR][CR]本皮肤不提供太多视图，仅有简单的视图使你能快速方便地访问你的媒体，没有花里胡哨的媒体信息显示功能
